name: places/ChIJuURJAYxZwokRI7hCsVDgO88
formattedAddress: 355 W Broadway, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 355 W Broadway, New York, NY 10013-2351, USA

originalText.text: It was truly a wonderful experience, my hair looks amazing. I had very damaged, flat, streaky highlights, brassy, orange blonde hair, it was a mess!  Koby gave me beautiful balayage while preserving the health of my hair and not using bleach. He also cut about 4/5 inches and gave me layers. I have honestly never been so pleased with a shorter hair cut. I feel completely refreshed and confident, he really takes every detail into consideration like even eye color. You will definitely feel the passion and creativity  in Koby’s work. I absolutely recommend this place and will be coming back with my sister.

originalText.text:
Amanda is the best stylist I’ve ever met. I have really challenging hair - it is curly, fine, has split ends, and also is grey in some areas - but every time I get my hair colored or cut and colored by Amanda, it looks awesome.  She takes such care to make the cut just right and the blow dry absolutely perfect.
Amanda also did my hair for my wedding recently (extensions and all) and I’ve never felt more confident about how my hair looked than that day. She also did my mom’s hair and the hair of 3 of my bridesmaids for my wedding and everyone looked fabulous. And Amanda had never worked on any of their hair prior.
Besides being extremely skilled, Amanda is also super friendly and funny so spending the time with her at the salon (or most recently at the hotel getting ready all day for my weddding) is a great time. Highly recommend for anyone who is particular and expects excellence!

originalText.text:
12/10 experience overall, BEST SALON
To start off this review I want to give background my hair was horrible going into any salon and I really needed a place that would fix everything from the flat shape to the color due to another overpriced salon sadly, ruining my curls. When looking for a salon I was intrigued initially seeing that alibi used hair care that is completely detergent free. This made me happy considering my hair is curly, temperamental and doesn’t react well to detergents, so I decided to call. I was able to get an appointment and I’m so glad I did. Initially going in I had a completely different idea as to how I wanted my hair to look, but I also did admit to needing help with what would look best on me and we decided that he could give my hair a much needed make over. All the products used smelled so nice and natural and felt extremely conditioning and lightweight on my curls. Not only did I appreciate the products used, my stylist Koby took the time to assess what was needed and consulted another stylist to make sure my hair would tone up snd turn out perfectly. When waiting for the dye to set, Koby told me I was able to go relax on the private salon patio, while I waited for a rinse, which is a rare find in New York and such a nice, comforting vibe. After washing, it was time for the hair cut; he suggested bangs, and a choppy, lots of layers cut, and I was open to any style so I let him roll with it. For my first ever set of bangs, I couldn’t be happier with the turnout. Koby really has an eye for choosing a style that not only fits your face, but your style and vibe. I can say with confidence that this was the best salon experience I’ve had thus far, and I never write reviews but this one was well deserved. I HIGHLY, HIGHLY suggest this salon, and thank you again Koby for the awesome hair makeover!

originalText.text: This salon is TOP NOTCH--and conveniently located in Flatiron, so it's a win/win situation with Alibi 25. Koby gives me the most beautiful, well-crafted haircuts I've ever gotten, and in 5 years he has never given me the same haircut twice. I always leave feeling confident and sassy. The whole experience from start to finish is decadent without being pretentious. The staff is smart, friendly, and professional. I have never gotten so many compliments on my long layers as I do when I leave Alibi 25. And my cut always grows out perfectly. I'll never go anywhere else!!

originalText.text: Without a doubt OBSESSED with Amanda May. I have never had such a fantastic experience getting my hair done. Great personality and really knows what she is doing. I cannot imagine letting anyone else do my white/grey hair. It's perfect and my hair is extremely healthy since we did it over time. I constantly get compliments on it. Her balayage work is also something that I lust over, and is flawless. I'm so serious when I say you have to go see this wonderful woman for ANY hair need.
